SELECT e.event_idx , e.event_title , e.event_content , e.event_writeDate , e.event_startDt , e.event_endDt , e.event_poster , e.event_thumbnail , c.eventCate_Subject FROM event e JOIN eventCate c ON e.event_category = c.eventCate_idx
WHERE event_idx = #{event_idx}

SELECT q.qna_idx , q.qna_title , q.qna_content , q.qna_category , c.qnaCate_subject FROM qna q JOIN qnaCate c ON q.qna_category = c.qnaCate_idx
WHERE q.qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
